Hello, I'm @hotoo /hÃºtÃº/, my Chinese nickname is "".

I worked at Ant Group (Alipay, Ant Fortune) and Douyin Group (ByteDance) for
over ten years. I specialize in full-stack development in the front-end
direction, proficient in JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, and React
technologies. I have knowledge of various programming languages such as Java,
Go, Python, C++, Shell, Vue.js, SQL, and UML. I have a computer science
background. I am passionate about open source and a core developer of Egg.js,
Sea.js, and Arale.js, and the developer of the well-known pinyin library. I am
the inventor of several domestic and international innovative patents. A
practitioner and promoter of Vim.

I am currently an independent developer, focusing on Web3 and AI. Please contact
me if you have suitable projects or job opportunities. Thanks.


Contact Me#

 * GitHub: @hotoo
 * Twitter: @hotoo
 * Wechat: hotoome
 * Telegram: @hotoome

A desktop calendar for 2026, made from one sheet of paper. After folding, one
side contains a useful 12-month calendar. On the other side there is brief
